name: director-v2
intent:
Build a robust, agentic AI coding kernel (Director Kernel v2). 
  It transforms human intent into working software through layered constraints (MS5->MS4->MS3->MS2).
  
  Key Features:
  - Content-addressed storage (SHA-256)
  - Incremental builds via checkpoint caching
  - Budget controls (warn/pause)
  - Build state machine with crash recovery
  - OpenRouter LLM integration
  
  Core Modules:
  - Kernel Orchestrator: Build lifecycle & state machine
  - Artifact Store: Persistence & CAS
  - Transform Engine: MS pipeline execution (MS5->MS4->MS3->MS2)
  - Model Router: LLM API handling with retries
  - Context Slicer: Bounded context generation
